definition: to look favorably on sth/would be glad to see it happen
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
to look favorably on sth/would be glad see it happen
not to get involved/to stay out of it
to dismiss with a laugh/to make light of
lit. to push the boat with the current/fig. to take advantage of the situation for one's own benefit
